title: 雲老頭又打算放多個中堅走。

replies.msg:
After being dropped to the bench on Sunday, speculation linking Arsenal centre-back Shkodran Mustafi with a move to Italy has increased.

The Germany international only joined Arsenal last summer from Valencia, but Arsene Wenger is willing to let him move on as he looks at ways to trim his squad.
賀定柒咕六咁仲放
